QuestData.Title: The Ohn'ahran Plains Advanced Tour
QuestData.Description:
The advanced courses should be more challenging, but I am sure it is nothing you cannot handle!
My bronze colleagues have set up advanced courses in the Ohn'ahran Plains that have a few obstacles and surprises thrown in them. You can also compete against your own best times!
Good luck!
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly each of the advanced courses in Ohn'ahran Plains.
